channel.title: Ind.ie Blog and Labs Blog
channel.description: The combined Ind.ie blog and Ind.ie Labs blog feeds.

item.title: Fight for your right to (Crypto) Party
item.description:
Jo writes about her first ever Crypto Party experience in London.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.
item.author: Jo Porter

item.title: Tethered Beings
item.description:
The roundup is back! Aral and I are settling into our new office in the shed, and I’ve been itching to share links with you all week.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.
item.author: Laura Kalbag

item.title: Farewell Caspar
item.description:
We were sad to hear Caspar Bowden died this week. It’s a huge blow to our community, and every citizen who has, and will still, benefit from his tenacious work for human rights.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.

item.title: Using System Headers In Swift
item.description:
CocoaPods to the rescue.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Stefan van den Oord

item.title: Handle
item.description:
A Swift micro-library for easily and expressively handling and posting notifications.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: Gracefully running node as an NSTask in Cocoa
item.description:
Tasks created by your app should be automatically terminated if your app crashes or when you kill your app by pressing the stop button in Xcode. They’re not. This sample app shows one way around the problem by having your child task terminate itself if its parent dies.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: Delay
item.description:
A Swift micro-library for easily and expressively delaying execution of code.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: Animating Cocoa Window Size When Using Auto Layout
item.description:
A simple example showing you how to cleanly change the window size when your views use auto layout.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: NSSplitViewController Auto Layout Bug and Workaround
item.description:
Setting one of the two split view items in an NSSplitViewController as collapsed in Interface Builder can cause a runtime constraints error.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: SecRandomCopyBytes, or: Playing Unsafe with Swift
item.description:
There are many ways to generate random data on iOS and OS X, but I wanted to use this one because it is suitable for cryptographic purposes.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Stefan van den Oord

item.title: Swift: Avoiding double-wrapped optionals with conditional downcasting
item.description:
Cast away your double-wrapped optionals in Swift.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: App Sandbox: Updating NSUserDefaults fails after deleting app’s container directory
item.description:
TL;DR: You didn’t empty the trash.

item.title: Expand and collapse accessibility on the Ind.ie manifesto
item.description:
Using WAI-ARIA attributes can make expanding and collapsing content more accessible.

item.title: Node 0.12.0 and native add-on modules
item.description:
If your Node projects depend on native add-on modules, they might break in Node 0.12.0.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: Installing NPM packages from GitLab repositories
item.description:
If you want to install an NPM package from a GitLab repository, use the git+https (or git+http) protocol, not git:// or https://.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
item.author: Aral Balkan

item.title: Build-time optimisation with Xcode build scripts
item.description:
Running a shell script during the Xcode build process lets you do some powerful things. I’m using it to cut down the size of the Heartbeat binary.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie Labs blog.
